channel.title: 🏢 Samsung Electronics on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Samsung Electronics on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DEPrune: Depth-wise Separable Convolution Pruning for Maximizing GPU Parallelism
item.description: DEPrune: A novel GPU-optimized pruning method for depthwise separable convolutions, achieving up to 3.74x speedup on EfficientNet-B0 with no accuracy loss!
